altTitles.ja-ro: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! - Night and Day (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! - Please Teach Me a Reason (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 家庭教師ヒットマンREBORN! - Night and Day (Doujinshi)

description.en:
Nitro Koutetsu's 3rd reprint anthology compiling a selection of self-written Katekyo Hitman Reborn! doujinshi.

01. Soredemo Sekai wa Mawatteru

02. Scar: originally published in YH Yamamoto Hibari Anthology

03. mano: originally published in the anthology splash! and also reprinted in volume 3 of Bambino Machineguns
(Iemitsu + Dino) Not scanlated

04. Highschool Grateful Life

05. 始まってもいない: originally published in the anthology CORAGGIO!
(Pairing: Hibari x Tsuna) Not scanlated

06. Shou (焦): originally published in the anthology golden delicious hour and also reprinted in the anthology バンビーノマシンガンズ 番外編 D.V Syndrome
(Pairing: Xanxus ← Squalo) Not scanlated

07. Hinemosu Kimi ni Ubawareru

08. Please teach me a reason

09. Initiative

10. sigaretta: originally published in an anthology under the title Odore
（イベントアンソロ書き下ろし）

11. coward!: originally published in the anthology ヒバリMANIAX
(Pairing: Yamamoto x Hibari - 8018)
Hibari comes home to find an uninvited Yamamoto waiting for him -- in the bathtub.

12. Boku no Te ga Yasashii to Nakunara
